section-starting-page.title: Discover Qodana
section-starting-page.description: These topics will help you get started with Qodana.

a.description: Qodana is a code quality monitoring platform that brings into your CI/CD pipelines all the smart features you love in the JetBrains IDEs as well as project-level checks like clone detection and license audit.
Learn how to get started with Qodana in a few simple steps
The Qodana for JVM linter lets you perform static analysis of Java and Kotlin for Server Side projects, with Spring, Jakarta EE, Java EE, Micronaut, Quarkus, Helidon, and more JVM frameworks support.
The Qodana Community for JVM linter lets you perform static analysis of Java and Kotlin for Server Side projects.
The Qodana Community for Android linter lets you perform static analysis of Java and Kotlin for Server Side projects with Android development support.
The Qodana for PHP linter lets you perform static analysis of PHP projects.
The Qodana for Python linter lets you perform static analysis of Python projects.
The Qodana for JS linter lets you perform static analysis of JavaScript and TypeScript projects.
Qodana Clone Finder compares a queried project against a number of reference projects and lists all duplicate functions ranked by their importance.
License audit helps software projects avoid problems with incompatible third-party licenses.
Qodana runs are configured via the `qodana.yaml` configuration file.
